info.title: Pick and Pack Protocol API
info.description:
The variables used in this collection are:

`{{environment}}` = Can be either `dev` or `prod`

`pnpApiKey` = API Key from Pick and Pack

`carrierId` = CarrierID from Pick and Pack

---

#### General instructions for using the API

All API access is over HTTPS and accessed from `https://api.pickingnpacking.com`. All data is sent and received as JSON.

Blank fields are included as `null` instead of being omitted.

All timestamps returned in UTC, ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ`.

All distance measurements are in meters.

environment.description: Server to access the authentication necessary to make a request in the Pick and Pack Provider API.
Environment of the Pick and Pack Protocol App.

post.description:
Creates a `JWT` (JSON Web Token) necessary to access the Pick and Pack Protocol API information.

>ℹ️ To generate the `JWT` it is necessary to have the `API KEY` previously generated by the Pick and Pack team.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

environment.description: Server to access the authentication necessary to make a request in the Pick and Pack Protocol API.

post.description:
Creates a service with the information that VTEX will send to the carrier. To understand how to integrate with a carrier, check the [VTEX Pick and Pack Carriers Integration Protocol](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/vtex-pick-and-pack) guide.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

get.description:
Returns information about a service, which can be queried by providing the carrier ID and the corresponding service ID as query parameters.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

patch.description:
Service that allows updating the details of the tracking service via webhook.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Shipment ID generated by the carrier.

post.description:
Service that allows the carriers to add notes/information on services.

``` graphql
[
  {
    type: ERROR | COMMENT!
    note: String!
    author: String
  }
]

 ```

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

post.description:
Service that allows the carrier to add evidence like proof of delivery or pickup to the shipping service, photos, text, others

``` graphql
[
  {
    type: IMAGE | TEXT!
    content: String!
    author: String
  }
]

 ```

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Shipment ID generated by the carrier

post.description:
Service that allows the carrier to add the shipping labels.

It is important that the tag ID is a unique value, if this value is repeated it will throw an exception

> ⚠️ If the label is type BASE64 or TXT, the max size that we allow is 180kb 
  

``` graphql
{
  id: String!
  url: String!
  name: String!
  type: PDF | BASE64 | TEXT | ZPL!
}

 ```

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Shipment ID generated by the carrier

post.description:
Service that will cancel an ongoing shipping service

``` graphql
{
  comment: String
  type: ERROR_CREATE_SERVICE  |  END_CLIENT_CANCELED  |  NO_THERE_DELIVERY_MAN_ASSIGN  |  OTHER!
}

 ```

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Shipment ID generated by the carrier

post.description:
Service that allows a carrier to temporarily pause a shipping service

``` graphql
{
  comment: String # reason
  type: ERROR_CREATE_SERVICE  |  END_CLIENT_PAUSE  |  NO_THERE_DELIVERY_MAN_ASSIGN  |  OTHER!
}

 ```

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
